# First load libraries
```{r}
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(leaflet)
library(scales)
library(ggmap)
```

# Read in data
```{r}
## Read in shapefile using sf
ak_regions <- read_sf("data/shapefiles/ak_regions_simp.shp")

plot(ak_regions)  
```
